Definition.WordDefinition: Manly, IA (city, FIPS 48900) Location: 43.28826 N, 93.20173 W Population (1990): 1349 (610 housing units) Area: 4.0 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 50456

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Manly \Man"ly\, a. [Compar. {Manlier}; superl. {Manliest}.] [Man + -ly. Cf. {Manlike}.] Having qualities becoming to a man; not childish or womanish; manlike, esp. brave, courageous, resolute, noble. [1913 Webster]
Let's briefly put on manly readiness. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
Serene and manly, hardened to sustain The load of life. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
Syn: Bold; daring; brave; courageous; firm; undaunted; hardy; dignified; stately. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Manly \Man"ly\, adv. In a manly manner; with the courage and fortitude of a manly man; as, to act manly. [1913 Webster]

manly adj 1: possessing qualities befitting a man [syn: {manful}, {manlike}] [ant: {unmanly}] 2: characteristic of a man; "a deep male voice"; "manly sports" [syn: {male}, {manful}, {manlike}, {virile}] adv : in a manful manner; with qualities thought to befit a man; "having said her say Peggy manfully shouldered her burden and prepared to break up yet another home" [syn: {manfully}] [ant: {unmanfully}] [also: {manliest}, {manlier}]
